title: Late Fee Forgiveness, Additional Storage, Air Conditioned
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Air Conditioned', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Package Acceptance', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Additional Storage', '-Laundry Facility', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Private Entrance', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
